description: This PHP source file implements a web-based 'Change Password' page for administrative users. It includes session management, access control, security features like CSRF protection, and client-side form validation to facilitate password updates within the device's web interface.

classes.name: csrfprotector_rdkb
classes.description: A class providing CSRF protection functionalities.

methods.name: set_config
methods.description: Handles setting a new password configuration by making an AJAX call to the server-side handler, providing user feedback based on the result.

methods.name: next_step
methods.description: Validates password inputs and triggers the password change process by calling set_config with appropriate data.

methods.name: cancel_save
methods.description: Resets the form or redirects to the index page.
